Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description:
Standard user authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

Example: "Bearer {user-token}"

post.description: Use either phone & phone_country_prefix OR phone_identifier

isolation_addresses.description: List of Isolation Addresses. Required if home_isolated is false.

signature.description: Base64 encoded image representing owner's digital signature

dsp_user_name.description: DSP user that validated the Declaration. Nullable

signature.description: Base64 encoded image representing owner's digital signature

message.example: Failed to send SMS to phone

details.example: A message was already sent to this phone number in the last minute. Try again later.
